name: Discovering Worlds
description:
A Love2d game where I want to start on a 4X game but only have a few hours until a game jam ends. So I'm trying to get 1X going for now.

Arrow keys move the player around, and so far nothing more interesting happens.

I had intended to experiment with better world generation, but my brain power seems to have run out for the day, so I'll probably submit this as-is to the 2021 Variety Megajam.

I want to continue working on terrain generation, but now I'm not sure if I'll do it in this project or in a different engine for future use.

Source code is MIT-licensed and linked under the more information dropdown.
